high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia Is Giving Away A Super Limited Edition ‘CyberPunk 2077’ RTX 2080 Ti Graphics Card - Forbes
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is providing a limited edition Cyberpunk 2077-themed graphics card for free.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event attracts significant attention due to the exclusive nature and the release of a new, limited-edition product.

high_impact_events.headline: Corsair’s One Pro i200: A Compact HEDT with Intel’s 10th Gen 14-Core CPU & NVIDIA’s RTX 2080 Ti - AnandTech
high_impact_events.summary: An introduction of a new computer system combining Corsair’s One Pro i200 and Intel's 10th generation processor with the RTX 2080 Ti graphics card.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event highlights a high-performance setup that is likely to attract tech enthusiasts and professionals.

high_impact_events.headline: Nvidia Ampere GPUs to feature 2x performance than the RTX 20 series, PCIe 4.0, up to 826 mm² dies and 20 GB of VRAM - Notebookcheck.net
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is developing a new generation of Ampere GPUs with increased performance and features.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event represents significant progress in GPU technology, which can impact gaming, professional software, and other high-performance computing needs.

high_impact_events.headline: RUMORS: NVIDIA Ampere GPU Massive Die Size, Specifications, Architecture and More! - Wccftech
high_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is rumored to be developing a new generation of Ampere GPUs with larger die sizes, enhanced specifications, and architectural improvements.
high_impact_events.rationale: This event involves speculation on the future technology roadmap, which can set industry expectations and influence consumer behavior.

medium_impact_events.headline: NVIDIA will introduce at least six new GeForce GTX and RTX laptop GPUs next month - Notebookcheck.net
medium_impact_events.summary: NVIDIA is expected to release a batch of new laptop GPU models in the coming months.
medium_impact_events.rationale: The introduction of new products can provide users with more options and enhance their computing experience, though the impact might not be as significant compared to high-performance announcements.
